original_title: Приключения Шерлока Холмса и доктора Ватсона: Двадцатый век начинается. Часть 2
overview: The final film of the television series "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson." It is based on the late and little-known stories of Arthur Conan Doyle, united by the theme of the approaching world war and the struggle of the legendary detective with foreign spies.
title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson: The Twentieth Century Begins, Part 2
